ygData.subject: Re: Problem with Anthem de Arms?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think you ve hit upon it.  It coule be that since the weapon can have the effect of Haste, and since that song doesn t seem to like to stick with any
ygData.messageBody:
>I don't see how it's possible either! That's why it's confusing the heck
>out of me. I tested it AGAIN with her last night, and she was still
>attacking faster than I was. It *does* increase my attack speed, but hers
>is increased by a much greater amount. A new bug? Something to do with
>the
>now useless haste function on my spear?

I think you've hit upon it. It coule be that since the weapon can have the
effect of Haste, and since that song doesn't seem to like to stick with any
other Haste type effects/spells/songs, that even though the charges are
used, this weapon will not be sped up, except with its own haste charge.

Just a guess, though.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 40 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
